channel.title: Midi clock mute
channel.description: Can somebody help to make a midi clock gate device. I need midi notes passing thru, but the midi clock needs to be switched off with a CC or Midi-note message.

item.title: Midi clock mute
item.dc:creator: @kirederF Frederik
item.description:
@kirederF wrote:

Can somebody help to make a midi clock gate device.
I need midi notes passing thru, but the midi clock needs to be switched off with a CC or Midi-note message.

Read full topic
